snippet: The depth of graft in the People’s Liberation Army will pose a delicate problem for the new leader, Xi Jinping, one that could undermine the Communist Party.
abstract: Insider critique written by Col Liu Mingfu of corruption in China's military, circulating just as new leadership is about to take over armed forces, warns that graft and wide-scale abuses pose as much of threat to nation's security as United States.
lead_paragraph: The depth of graft in the People’s Liberation Army will pose a delicate problem for the new leader, Xi Jinping, one that could undermine the Communist Party.

headline.seo: Corruption in China Military Poses Test
headline.main: Corruption in Military Poses a Test for China
headline.print_headline: Corruption in Military Poses a Test for China
